name: Once Upon A Dragon - TVjam Edition
name_original: Once Upon A Dragon - TVjam Edition
description:
Game made for 2019' TVjam.

You are a modern knight-witch, and as evry knight from fairytales, you must defeat a Dragon at some point. 

You can use use the keyboard for mouving, but a controller is needed to cast spells and use the sword.

Based on the TV show Once Upon A time.

Emma character made from  Warren Clarck's  Royal Knight.

Environment from ansimuz GothicVania.
